citations.narrative:
In the Muntjac enclosure, the door panel reinforcement of hardware cloth was jagged at the corner, creating sharp points
that could injure the animal and was no longer in good repair. The panel of livestock wire also had sharp points wrapped
around the rebar and pointing into the enclosure. Housing facilities shall be maintained in good repair to protect the
animals from injury.
Correct by 1 October, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
In the Muntjac enclosure, the door panel reinforcement of hardware cloth was jagged at the corner, creating sharp points 
that could injure the animal and was no longer in good repair. The panel of livestock wire also had sharp points wrapped 
around the rebar and pointing into the enclosure. Housing facilities shall be maintained in good repair to protect the 
animals from injury. 
 
Correct by 1 October, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
 n
